function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Vulnerability of pharmaceutical supply chains","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divisions in europe exacerbating due to pandemic response differences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opposition to mutual co-financing of public expenditures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Localised manufacturing impacting capacity for medical products","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of demand in the economy due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure of irresponsible government policies and decline of industrial sectors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential repetition of covid-19 type events in the future","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on women to combine paid work, unpaid domestic work, and home-schooling children","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Escalation of domestic violence during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Alteration of parenting agreements causing increased family stress and strain on courts during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased managerial prerogative allowing changes to employees’ duties and work arrangements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of health protections and economic support for garment workers in asian supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Women in feminised sectors at risk of continued exposure to the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strict health and safety measures in health and social work sectors","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural insensitivity in health response and decision-making","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender inequality and economic impact on women","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor nutrition and inadequate housing infrastructure heighten susceptibility to the pandemic within indigenous communities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rates of crowding and inadequate access to water in indigenous communities contribute to the difficulty of practicing social distancing and personal hygiene","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of domestic violence due to housing and financial stress within indigenous communities during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionately high incidence rates of disease among first nations peoples","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mobile population and exposure to fly-in fly-out workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining treatment for chronic conditions, such as access to dialysis","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lifting of onshore gas exploration moratoria","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of wind and solar from the us covid-19 stimulus package","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Support for coal operations under a major drinking water reservoir in australia","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wildlife ’reclaiming’ urban space, potentially bringing human and animal interaction that increases the risk of zoonotic diseases spreading to urban populations","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on domestic manufacturing and shorter supply chains may reconfigure the highly emissions-intensive maritime transportation sector, potentially leading to localized outbreaks of contagious diseases in manufacturing facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Suspension of environmental pollution laws and expansion of fossil fuel extractive industries may lead to increased air and water pollution, contributing to respiratory illnesses and environmental degradation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of the pandemic on different social groups due to differences in living conditions and access to resources","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased mental health issues due to social isolation, post-traumatic stress for health workers, and economic fallout","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed environmental effects of the pandemic, including improvements in air quality and reduction of pollution due to decreased travel, but also potential negative consequences for wildlife and ecological balance","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chronic under-funding of the world health organization who leading to limited resources for global health governance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Weakening of multilateral institutions, including the who, by influential developed countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Weak public health systems unable to manage population-wide approaches","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on imports for vital equipment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of prioritization of public health and wellbeing in economic systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weaknesses and disparities in healthcare systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of private sector models for healthcare in low-and middle-income countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in public social expenditures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising inequality and falling labor shares of income","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privatization of essential natural monopolies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in global inequality due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of vulnerabilities caused by neoliberalism","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of covid-19 on different social classes, genders, and age groups","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food insecurity and famine due to lockdowns and other crises","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of movement for essential medical personnel and supplies","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technologies for epidemic monitoring and control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-speed network reliance for tracking strategic locations and infected patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Industry 4.0 and medicine 4.0 adoption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
